TEXT.English: Press Ctrl + Alt + O to enter The BUG Mod Options Screen.
TEXT.French: Press Ctrl + Alt + O to enter The BUG Mod Options Screen.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Mit der Tastenkombination [STRG + ALT + O] lässt sich das Optionsmenü der BUG Mod aufrufen.
TEXT.Italian: Press Ctrl + Alt + O to enter The BUG Mod Options Screen.
TEXT.Spanish: Press Ctrl + Alt + O to enter The BUG Mod Options Screen.

TEXT.English: Ever forget to build that Barracks? Alt + M will allow you to set up reminders so you don't forget again!
TEXT.French: Ever forget to build that Barracks? Alt + M will allow you to set up reminders so you don't forget again!
TEXT.German: Tipp... Mit der Tastenkombination [ALT + M] lassen sich Erinnerungen verfassen, die nach einer festgelegten Anzahl Runden wieder erscheinen.
TEXT.Italian: Ever forget to build that Barracks? Alt + M will allow you to set up reminders so you don't forget again!
TEXT.Spanish: Ever forget to build that Barracks? Alt + M will allow you to set up reminders so you don't forget again!

TEXT.English: Alt + S allows you to make Sticky Notes on tiles. Just click and type. Pressing Alt + S again, and then clicking on an existing note will remove it.
TEXT.French: Alt + S allows you to make Sticky Notes on tiles. Just click and type. Pressing Alt + S again, and then clicking on an existing note will remove it.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Mit der Tastenkombination [ALT + S] lassen sich Haftnotizen an Geländefeldern anbringen. Eine Haftnotiz lässt sich mit der selben Tastenkombination auch wieder entfernen.
TEXT.Italian: Alt + S allows you to make Sticky Notes on tiles. Just click and type. Pressing Alt + S again, and then clicking on an existing note will remove it.
TEXT.Spanish: Alt + S allows you to make Sticky Notes on tiles. Just click and type. Pressing Alt + S again, and then clicking on an existing note will remove it.

TEXT.English: To cancel all Worker Orders quickly, select 1 worker with orders, and while holding the Alt key, click the cancel orders button.
TEXT.French: To cancel all Worker Orders quickly, select 1 worker with orders, and while holding the Alt key, click the cancel orders button.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Bei gedrückter [ALT]-Taste lassen sich die Missionen aller aktiven Arbeitstrupps per Mausklick auf das Abbrechensymbol eines aktiven Arbeitstrupps abbrechen.
TEXT.Italian: To cancel all Worker Orders quickly, select 1 worker with orders, and while holding the Alt key, click the cancel orders button.
TEXT.Spanish: To cancel all Worker Orders quickly, select 1 worker with orders, and while holding the Alt key, click the cancel orders button.

TEXT.English: Alt + E will allow you to make a custom Event in the autologger.
TEXT.French: Alt + E will allow you to make a custom Event in the autologger.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Mit der Tastenkombination [ALT + E] lassen sich eigene Ereignisse in das automatische Logbuch eintragen.
TEXT.Italian: Alt + E will allow you to make a custom Event in the autologger.
TEXT.Spanish: Alt + E will allow you to make a custom Event in the autologger.

TEXT.English: Clicking on the Yellow "!" within the Domestic Advisor will allow you to customize it to your playing style.
TEXT.French: Clicking on the Yellow "!" within the Domestic Advisor will allow you to customize it to your playing style.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Mit einem Klick auf das gelbe "!" im Bildschirm "Inland" lässt sich dieser an den eigenen Spielstil anpassen.
TEXT.Italian: Clicking on the Yellow "!" within the Domestic Advisor will allow you to customize it to your playing style.
TEXT.Spanish: Clicking on the Yellow "!" within the Domestic Advisor will allow you to customize it to your playing style..

TEXT.English: To create rally points, select the city, or cities, you are building units it, hold down the Shift key and Right Click on the tile you want your rally point to be at. You will see a yellow circle showing the rally point.[NEWLINE]To cancel orders select the same city or cities, Shift and Right click on any city square, and it will cancel the rally orders.
TEXT.French: To create rally points, select the city, or cities, you are building units it, hold down the Shift key and Right Click on the tile you want your rally point to be at. You will see a yellow circle showing the rally point.[NEWLINE]To cancel orders select the same city or cities, Shift and Right click on any city square, and it will cancel the rally orders.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Bei gedrückter [UMSCHALT]-Taste in Verbindung mit einem Rechtsklick lässt sich für eine oder mehrere Städte ein Sammelpunkt für Einheiten setzen. Der Sammelpunkt wird durch einen gelben Kreis markiert. Wird bei gedrückter [UMSCHALT]-Taste in Verbindung mit einem Rechtsklick ein Stadtgeländefeld ausgewählt, lässt sich der Sammelpunkt wieder aufheben.
TEXT.Italian: To create rally points, select the city, or cities, you are building units it, hold down the Shift key and Right Click on the tile you want your rally point to be at. You will see a yellow circle showing the rally point.[NEWLINE]To cancel orders select the same city or cities, Shift and Right click on any city square, and it will cancel the rally orders.
TEXT.Spanish: To create rally points, select the city, or cities, you are building units it, hold down the Shift key and Right Click on the tile you want your rally point to be at. You will see a yellow circle showing the rally point.[NEWLINE]To cancel orders select the same city or cities, Shift and Right click on any city square, and it will cancel the rally orders.

TEXT.English: When a tile is in the City Cross of two different cities, then you can change its ownership by clicking on that tile from the chosen city’s City Screen.
TEXT.French: When a tile is in the City Cross of two different cities, then you can change its ownership by clicking on that tile from the chosen city’s City Screen.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Befindet sich ein Geländefeld im Einzugsbereich zweier Städte, lässt sich dessen Zugehörigkeit festlegen, indem es im Stadt-Bildschirm der betreffenden Stadt per Mausklick ausgewählt wird.
TEXT.Italian: When a tile is in the City Cross of two different cities, then you can change its ownership by clicking on that tile from the chosen city’s City Screen.
TEXT.Spanish: When a tile is in the City Cross of two different cities, then you can change its ownership by clicking on that tile from the chosen city’s City Screen.

TEXT.English: When you're weak there is no shame in giving into rivals demands. This will give you time to build your defenses as you enjoy the short boost in attitude between your nations.
TEXT.French: When you're weak there is no shame in giving into rivals demands. This will give you time to build your defenses as you enjoy the short boost in attitude between your nations.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Es ist keine Schande, in einer unterlegenen Position den Forderungen von stärkeren Gegnern nachzukommen. Die durch die kurze Verbesserung der diplomatischen Beziehungen gewonnene Zeit kann genutzt werden, um die eigenen Verteidigungslinien zu verstärken.
TEXT.Italian: When you're weak there is no shame in giving into rivals demands. This will give you time to build your defenses as you enjoy the short boost in attitude between your nations.
TEXT.Spanish: When you're weak there is no shame in giving into rivals demands. This will give you time to build your defenses as you enjoy the short boost in attitude between your nations.

TEXT.English: When at War, use fast moving units to pillage strategic resources such as Iron, or Aluminum first, and leave a sentry to prevent the enemy from reconnecting that resource.
TEXT.French: When at War, use fast moving units to pillage strategic resources such as Iron, or Aluminum first, and leave a sentry to prevent the enemy from reconnecting that resource.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Während eines Krieges sollten schnelle Einheiten genutzt werden, um zuerst strategische Ressourcen, wie Eisen oder Aluminium, zu plündern. Nachrückende Einheiten sollten dann deren Bewachung übernehmen, um dem Gegner den Zugang zu diesen Ressourcen dauerhaft zu verwehren.
TEXT.Italian: When at War, use fast moving units to pillage strategic resources such as Iron, or Aluminum first, and leave a sentry to prevent the enemy from reconnecting that resource.
TEXT.Spanish: When at War, use fast moving units to pillage strategic resources such as Iron, or Aluminum first, and leave a sentry to prevent the enemy from reconnecting that resource.

TEXT.English: Save your promotions for when your unit is injured to speed up healing, and when you promote, tailor your unit for the type of enemy you are facing.
TEXT.French: Save your promotions for when your unit is injured to speed up healing, and when you promote, tailor your unit for the type of enemy you are facing.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Eine verfügbare Beförderung braucht nicht sofort auf eine Einheit angewendet zu werden. Manchmal lohnt es sich zu warten, um im passenden Moment die bestgeeignete Beförderung und Bonusfähigkeit zu wählen. Eine Beförderung wirkt auf verletzte Einheiten übrigens heilsam.
TEXT.Italian: Save your promotions for when your unit is injured to speed up healing, and when you promote, tailor your unit for the type of enemy you are facing.
TEXT.Spanish: Save your promotions for when your unit is injured to speed up healing, and when you promote, tailor your unit for the type of enemy you are facing.

TEXT.English: Always have siege equipment before attacking a city. A Swordsman can do more damage entering through a hole in the wall, then trying to climb over it with arrows raining down from above.
TEXT.French: Always have siege equipment before attacking a city. A Swordsman can do more damage entering through a hole in the wall, then trying to climb over it with arrows raining down from above.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Für die Einnahme einer größeren Stadt sollten genügend Belagerungswaffen zur Verfügung stehen, um die Verteidigungsanlagen niederzureißen und die Verteidiger zu schwächen.
TEXT.Italian: Always have siege equipment before attacking a city. A Swordsman can do more damage entering through a hole in the wall, then trying to climb over it with arrows raining down from above.
TEXT.Spanish: Always have siege equipment before attacking a city. A Swordsman can do more damage entering through a hole in the wall, then trying to climb over it with arrows raining down from above.

TEXT.English: Examine what resources are before researching worker techs. Why research Animal Husbandry when only have Corn and Wheat near?
TEXT.French: Examine what resources are before researching worker techs. Why research Animal Husbandry when only have Corn and Wheat near?
TEXT.German: Tipp... Die Erkundung des Umlands ist lebenswichtig, vor allem das Auffinden von Ressourcen. Dieses erlaubt eine Planung der Expansion und der technologischen Entwicklung, um die Rohstoffe möglichst schnell erschließen und nutzen zu können.
TEXT.Italian: Examine what resources are before researching worker techs. Why research Animal Husbandry when only have Corn and Wheat near?
TEXT.Spanish: Examine what resources are before researching worker techs. Why research Animal Husbandry when only have Corn and Wheat near?

TEXT.English: Always escort your Settlers. It's mighty dangerous out in the Wilderness.
TEXT.French: Always escort your Settlers. It's mighty dangerous out in the Wilderness.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Wertvolle Einheiten ohne nennenswerte Verteidigungsfähigkeiten, wie Siedler und Galeonen, können leicht Opfer von Angriffen werden und verdienen deshalb auf fremdem Terrain einen Begleitschutz.
TEXT.Italian: Always escort your Settlers. It's mighty dangerous out in the Wilderness.
TEXT.Spanish: Always escort your Settlers. It's mighty dangerous out in the Wilderness.

TEXT.English: Play to your Civilizations traits, and specialize your Empire. No use being Charismatic and Aggressive and never starting a war.
TEXT.French: Play to your Civilizations traits, and specialize your Empire. No use being Charismatic and Aggressive and never starting a war.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Der eigene Spielstil sollte sich an den Eigenschaften des gewählten Staatsoberhaupts orientieren und die Zivilisation entsprechend spezialisiert werden. Die Eigenschaften "Charismatisch" und "Aggressiv" nützen wenig, wenn keine Kriege beabsichtigt sind.
TEXT.Italian: Play to your Civilizations traits, and specialize your Empire. No use being Charismatic and Aggressive and never starting a war.
TEXT.Spanish: Play to your Civilizations traits, and specialize your Empire. No use being Charismatic and Aggressive and never starting a war.

TEXT.English: Selling resources that you no longer use, such as copper or iron, can pay off nicely over the long run.
TEXT.French: Selling resources that you no longer use, such as copper or iron, can pay off nicely over the long run. Just make sure it's to a weaker friend!
TEXT.German: Tipp... Der Verkauf von zwischenzeitlich unbrauchbaren Ressourcen, wie Kupfer oder Eisen, kann langfristig vorteilhaft sein, wenn der Käufer ein momentan noch schwacher Verbündeter ist.
TEXT.Italian: Selling resources that you no longer use, such as copper or iron, can pay off nicely over the long run. Just make sure it's to a weaker friend!
TEXT.Spanish: Selling resources that you no longer use, such as copper or iron, can pay off nicely over the long run. Just make sure it's to a weaker friend!

TEXT.English: Don't neglect your Diplomacy! Pay attention to the Alerts that pop up, telling you what is available out there.
TEXT.French: Don't neglect your Diplomacy! Pay attention to the Alerts that pop up, telling you what is available out there.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Die Diplomatie sollte nicht vernachlässigt werden. Während einer Partie erscheinende Meldung zeigen ständig die verfügbaren Handelswaren anderer Zivilisationen.
TEXT.Italian: Don't neglect your Diplomacy! Pay attention to the Alerts that pop up, telling you what is available out there.
TEXT.Spanish: Don't neglect your Diplomacy! Pay attention to the Alerts that pop up, telling you what is available out there.

TEXT.English: Be the first to circle the globe, and your Naval Units all receive +1 movement.
TEXT.French: Be the first to circle the globe, and your Naval Units all receive +1 movement.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Die See-Einheiten der Zivilisation, die als erste die Welt umrundet, erhalten einen Bewegungsbonus von +1.
TEXT.Italian: Be the first to circle the globe, and your Naval Units all receive +1 movement.
TEXT.Spanish: Be the first to circle the globe, and your Naval Units all receive +1 movement.

TEXT.English: Animals can't enter your land, so it can be worth the risk to leave your city undefended and use your warrior for early exploration.
TEXT.French: Animals can't enter your land, so it can be worth the risk to leave your city undefended and use your warrior for early exploration.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Tiere können die Grenzen von Städten nicht überschreiten. Deshalb kann es sinnvoll sein, ein Risiko einzugehen und Städte zunächst unbewacht zu lassen, um mit den ersten Kriegern die Welt schon früh zu erkunden.
TEXT.Italian: Animals can't enter your land, so it can be worth the risk to leave your city undefended and use your warrior for early exploration.
TEXT.Spanish: Animals can't enter your land, so it can be worth the risk to leave your city undefended and use your warrior for early exploration.

TEXT.English: Form trade relations with nations that get along with each other to avoid an attitude penalty.
TEXT.French: Form trade relations with nations that get along with each other to avoid an attitude penalty.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Zwischen ähnlichen Zivilisationen sollten Handelsverbindungen geknüpft werden, um einen Beziehungsmalus zu vermeiden.
TEXT.Italian: Form trade relations with nations that get along with each other to avoid an attitude penalty.
TEXT.Spanish: Form trade relations with nations that get along with each other to avoid an attitude penalty.

TEXT.English: If you neglect your military, and your power becomes weak, a neighbor WILL attack you.
TEXT.French: If you neglect your military, and your power becomes weak, a neighbor WILL attack you.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Das Militär sollte nicht vernachlässigt werden. Ein schwaches Reich wird gern von benachbarten Reichen angegriffen.
TEXT.Italian: If you neglect your military, and your power becomes weak, a neighbor WILL attack you.
TEXT.Spanish: If you neglect your military, and your power becomes weak, a neighbor WILL attack you.

TEXT.English: Station naval units near your water based resources, and put them on Sea Patrol to protect your resources.
TEXT.French: Station naval units near your water based resources, and put them on Sea Patrol to protect your resources.
TEXT.German: Tipp... See-Einheiten sollten in der Nähe von Ressourcen auf Meeres-Geländefeldern stationiert und mit dem Auftrag "Seepatrouille" versehen werden, um diese zu verteidigen.
TEXT.Italian: Station naval units near your water based resources, and put them on Sea Patrol to protect your resources.
TEXT.Spanish: Station naval units near your water based resources, and put them on Sea Patrol to protect your resources.

TEXT.English: When selling Technologies, shop around for the highest bidder, and then work your way down.
TEXT.French: When selling Technologies, shop around for the highest bidder, and then work your way down.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Beim Technologiehandel sollten die Angebote verschiedener Oberhäupter verglichen werden, um dann dem höchsten Bieter den Zuschlag zu geben.
TEXT.Italian: When selling Technologies, shop around for the highest bidder, and then work your way down.
TEXT.Spanish: When selling Technologies, shop around for the highest bidder, and then work your way down.

TEXT.English: Watch your neighbor civic changes. A change from Free Religion to Theology could mean an arms build up.
TEXT.French: Watch your neighbor civic changes. A change from Free Religion to Theology could mean an arms build up.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Ein Wechsel der Gesellschaftsform in einem benachbarten Reich sollte aufmerksam verfolgt werden. Er könnte die Vorbereitung auf einen Krieg sein.
TEXT.Italian: Watch your neighbor civic changes. A change from Free Religion to Theology could mean an arms build up.
TEXT.Spanish: Watch your neighbor civic changes. A change from Free Religion to Theology could mean an arms build up.

TEXT.English: Speak softly and carry a big stick, and you will go far.
TEXT.French: Speak softly and carry a big stick, and you will go far.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Anregungen und Hinweise zur "BUG Mod" können bei civfanatics.com im Forum hinterlassen werden.
TEXT.Italian: Speak softly and carry a big stick, and you will go far.
TEXT.Spanish: Speak softly and carry a big stick, and you will go far.

TEXT.English: Sometimes it's better to stop a Scout or Explorer on a forest, hill, or jungle tile and losing the extra movement in favor of safety.
TEXT.French: Sometimes it's better to stop a Scout or Explorer on a forest, hill, or jungle tile and losing the extra movement in favor of safety.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Es kann sinnvoll sein, einen Späher oder Kundschafter die Runde auf einem Wald-, Hügel- or Dschungel-Geländefeld beenden zu lassen, um die überschüssigen Bewegungspunkte gegen Sicherheit zu tauschen.
TEXT.Italian: Sometimes it's better to stop a Scout or Explorer on a forest, hill, or jungle tile and losing the extra movement in favor of safety.
TEXT.Spanish: Sometimes it's better to stop a Scout or Explorer on a forest, hill, or jungle tile and losing the extra movement in favor of safety.
